lever.additional:
Within years we have created creative campaigns that not only are the main talk of town but the pride of the nation, but also helped to communicate our vision and values to create the impact at scale. 

As an in-house creative department, we have successfully delivered the best output and were making some achievements abroad.

Applicants must be prepared for a fast-paced and self-motivated environment. You will be given the opportunity to work with a diverse group of people in a fun and ever-changing industry!


Gojek is an equal opportunity workplace that is committed to diversity and inclusion. At Gojek we celebrate our differences, because we believe that diversity not only creates a healthier work environment for our employees, but also helps our business thrive. 



About us

Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!
lever.description: Creativity is an imagination to produce an idea that is authentic. Today's business solutions are found by translating user data to insights and creative execution. This leads to evolution in the society, especially in our Creative Lab team. As a Strategic Planner you will create the creative-lab roadmap strategy and prepare a strong and inspiring brief for the Creative team to work on.

lists.content:
• Conducting market research and data analysis to develop strategic plans
  • Defining touch-points that will lead to roadmap strategy making
  • Create the creative roadmap strategy
  • Create the strategy for Creative Planner to work on
  • Review creative solutions and output, in alignment with the developed strategy
  • Create the content of the deck on strategy part (objectives, target audience / target market, product and market insight, consumer journey, touch-points, campaign phasing, timeline)
  • Monitoring the performance
  • Initiate maneuver (if needed) on content, creative, media, etc
  • Collaborating with relevant team members to build reporting and analytics capabilities
  • Generating ideas and ensuring the ideas are relevant

• At least 10 years of working experience (brand / marketing / market research / campaigns)
  • Knowledgeable in trends
  • Strong communication with excellent influencing and presentation skills
  • Strong ability to set clear measurable objectives, delegate responsibilities, assesses
  • Drive and hunger to achieve results, entrepreneur mindset
  • Independent self-starter, initiative, and the ability to work in fast-paced and ambiguous environment
  • Excellent business acumen, analytical skill and willingness to be hands-on, and work within tight deadlines
  • High commitment, confidence, motivation and flexibility
